awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE ISLETA PUEBLO TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL  PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD ENVIRONMENTAL CAPACITY TO MANAGE THE ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, TRAVEL AND TRAINING, OUTREACH, RECYCLING AND POLLUTION PREVENTION (LEAD BASED PAINT, ASBESTOS AND PESTICIDES

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE ISLETA PUEBLO TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD ENVIRONMENTAL CAPACITY TO MANAGE THE ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, TRAVEL AND TRAINING, OUTREACH, THE GAP PROGRAM SHALL ALSO INCREASE THE ENVIRONMENT DEPARTMENT'S CAPABILITIES TO CONTINUOUSLY IMPROVE ITS ABILITIES TO REMEDIATE AREAS OF ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERN AND PROTECT AREAS MEETING ENVIRONMENTAL GOALS.ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD ENVIRONMENTAL CAPACITY TO MANAGE THE ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, TRAVEL AND TRAINING, OUTREACH, THE GAP PROGRAM SHALL ALSO INCREASE THE ENVIRONMENT DEPARTMENT'S CAPABILITIES TO CONTINUOUSLY IMPROVE ITS ABILITIES TO REMEDIATE AREAS OF ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERN AND PROTECT AREAS MEETING ENVIRONMENTAL GOALS.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QA DOCUMENTS, REPORTING, MAINTAIN AND INCREASE ENVIRONMENTAL CAPACITIES THAT IMPACT PUEBLO
